name: THE LAST JOB (www.Gamer.Zone)
description:
"THE LAST JOB" IS A ESCAPE ROOM PUZZLE GAME FOR DESKTOP PC. MADE IN 9 DAYS FOR THE GOTM.IO JAM #8!

 (https://gotm.io/gamerzone/thelastjob)

DIFFICULTY LEVEL: MIDDLE / HARD

GAMEPLAY 

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• 

YOUR JOB IS TO ROB A BANK. THINK OUT OF THE BOX TO FIND HINTS AND OPEN ROOMS!

STORY 

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• 

YOUR FAMILY IS A FAMOUS CLAN OF THIEVES FROM ITALY, WHO ARE MOSTLY IN PRISON. A CURSE OF FAILURE HAS RULED THE FAMILY FOR GENERATIONS. WILL YOU BE THE FIRST TO BREAK THE CURSE AND CHANGE HISTORY OR ARE YOU JUST ANOTHER FAILURE OF THE FAMILY? THINK OUTSIDE THE BOX AND DON'T GIVE UP TOO QUICKLY. WITH THE RIGHT TIME, THE PROGRESS WILL COME. IS THE TIME WORTH THE MONEY? YOU WILL FIND OUT.

CONTROLS

 ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

[W] [A] [S] [D] MOVE 

[SPACE] JUMP 

[F] FLASHLIGHT

 [E] INTERACT

 [X] MENU
